Bentyl (dicyclomine):First I want to thank you all for your reviews.  These reviews helped me to finally be brave enough to take Bentyl for IBS.  I was sick for months. I do not understand how this is even possible given my conditions, but Bentyl takes me from severe, debilitating pain to almost total relief without any anxiety, tachycardia, or sedation.  I have turned the internet inside out to try to find out why this is the case, but have found no explanation.  It continues to work wonders for my IBS.
